newsitem.title: USA: Texas Petrochemicals idles unit, trims MTBE output.
newsitem.headline: Texas Petrochemicals idles unit, trims MTBE output.

text.p: Texas Petrochemicals Corp on Thursday idled one of two dehydro units at its Houston manufacturing plant in a move that will cut its production of methyl tertiary butyl ether (MTBE) to 13,000 barrels per day, a spokesman said.
The plant, located east of Houston on the ship channel, has a rated capacity to produce 25,000 barrels per day of MTBE, a gasoline additive, he said.
The dehydro unit was idled in reaction to rising feedstock costs for isobutane and methanol and declining prices for MTBE, he said.
